long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Try on clothing virtually

How It Works
1. Upload a clear photo of yourself from medium distance
2. Visit your favorite online stores as usual
3. Hover over any image and Click “Try It On”
4. Save your favorite products. Design outfits from different stores. Plan your new favorite looks before they arrive.

Available on all your favorite apparel sites!
